message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $18,000, which reflects the true worth of its capabilities.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is outside of my budget. I'm interested in this product, but I can only go as high as $10,000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $18,000 is really my bottom line. I'm willing to come down a bit to $16,000, but I can't go any lower than that.

Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my budget, but $16,000 is still a bit high.  I'm firm on my maximum of $10,000.  If you're willing to meet me there, I'm ready to purchase.  Let me know your thoughts.
